general.quote: Spread love üíñ everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.

general.quote: When you reach the end of your rope ü™¢ , tie a knot in it and hang on.

general.quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique üòá. Just like everyone else.

general.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. üòä

general.quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.

general.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart üíì.

general.quote: It is during our darkest üåë moments that we must focus to see the light ‚òÄÔ∏è.

general.quote: Whoever is happy üòä will make others happy too.

general.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail

general.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
general.author: Wayne Gretzky

general.quote: I have learned over the years that when one's mind ü§Ø is made up, this diminishes fear.

general.quote: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the water to create many ripples.
general.author: Mother Teresa

general.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says, ‚ÄòI'm possible!'
general.author: Audrey Hepburn

general.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.

general.quote: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.
general.author: Oprah Winfrey

general.quote: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.
general.author: Vincent van Gogh

general.quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.

general.quote: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on.

general.quote: I didn't fail the test. I just found 100 ways to do it wrong.

general.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.

general.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.

general.quote: an Error Doesn't Become A Mistake Until You Refuse to Correct It.

life.quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.
life.author: Maya Angelou

life.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
life.author: Abraham Lincoln

life.quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
life.author: Babe Ruth

life.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
life.author: Helen Keller

life.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
life.author: Thomas A. Edison

life.quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
life.author: Dr. Seuss

life.quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life and be without flavor.
life.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

life.quote: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
life.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

life.quote: Life is never fair, and perhaps it is a good thing for most of us that it is not.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
life.author: Tony Robbins

life.quote: In this life we cannot do great things. We can only do small things with great love.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
life.author: John Lennon

life.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined.
life.author: Henry David Thoreau

life.quote: Love is the strongest force the world possesses.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: Life is too short for long-term grudges.
life.author: Elon Musk

life.quote: Life consists not in holding good cards but in playing those you hold well.
life.author: Josh Billings

life.quote: Life is a mirror and will reflect back to the thinker what he thinks into it.
life.author: Ernest Holmes

life.quote: To live is to think.
life.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

life.quote: It is not length of life, but depth of life.
life.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

life.quote: There he goes. One of god's own prototypes. Some sort of high-powered mutant never considered for mass production. Too weird to live, and too rare to die.
life.author: Hunter S. Thompson

life.quote: If you want to be Strong Learn to live Alone.
life.author: Rowan Atkinson

life.quote: Do not set out in life to be an interesting person. Set out to be an interested person.
life.author: Gardner as quoted in Collins in 1997

life.quote: Gain all you can, save all you can, and give all you can.
life.author: John Wesley

success.quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
success.author: Winston S. Churchill

success.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
success.author: Henry David Thoreau

success.quote: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
success.author: Steve Jobs

success.quote: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
success.author: John D. Rockefeller Jr.

success.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
success.author: Thomas Jefferson

success.quote: The real test is not whether you avoid this failure, because you won't. It's whether you let it harden or shame you into inaction, or whether you learn from it; whether you choose to persevere.
success.author: Barack Obama

success.quote: Don't be distracted by criticism. Remember -- the only taste of success some people get is to take a bite out of you.
success.author: Zig Ziglar

success.quote: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes but they don't quit.
success.author: Conrad Hilton

success.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
success.author: Colin Powell

success.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
success.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

success.quote: Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don't wish it were easier; wish you were better.
success.author: Jim Rohn

success.quote: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.
success.author: James Cameron

success.quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
success.author: David Brinkley

success.quote: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
success.author: Albert Einstein

success.quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to success is more important than any other one thing.
success.author: Abraham Lincoln

success.quote: Work hard in silence. Success be your noise.
success.author: Frank Ocean

success.quote: Successful people don't fear failure but understand that it's necessary to learn and grow from.
success.author: Robert Kiyosaki

success.quote: I learned this, at least, by my experiment: that if one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
success.author: Henry David Thoreau

success.quote: If at first you don't succeed, try, try again. Then quit. No use being a damn fool about it.
success.author: W.C. Fields

success.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
success.author: Herman Melville

success.quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
success.author: Maya Angelou

success.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
success.author: Roy T. Bennett

success.quote: Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get.
success.author: W. P. Kinsella

success.quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
success.author: Truman Capote

success.quote: The worst part of success is trying to find someone who is happy for you.
success.author: Bette Midler

success.quote: Success makes so many people hate you. I wish it wasn't that way. It would be wonderful to enjoy success without seeing envy in the eyes of those around you.
success.author: Marilyn Monroe

success.quote: If A is a success in life, then A equals x plus y plus z. Work is x; y is play; and z is keeping your mouth shut.
success.author: Albert Einstein

success.quote: Cry. Forgive. Learn. Move on. Let your tears water the seeds of your future happiness.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: I'm a success today because I had a friend who believed in me and I didn't have the heart to let him down.
success.author: Abraham Lincoln

success.quote: Failure is the key to success; each mistake teaches us something.
success.author: Morihei Ueshiba

success.quote: The road to success is always under construction.
success.author: Lily Tomlin

success.quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
success.author: Truman Capote

success.quote: It's funny how many years it takes to become an overnight success.
success.author: Prince

motivational.quote: The Best Way To Get Started Is To Quit Talking And Begin Doing.

programming.quote: Ruby is rubbish! PHP is phpantastic!

programming.quote: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it‚Äôs bad.

dream.quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
